alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Rains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 2:21PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Hunt, southwestern Hopkins and Rains Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Caddo Mills to 6 miles west of Como. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Sulphur Springs, West Tawakoni, Quinlan, Emory, and surrounding areas. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 80 and 93. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
